metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23455 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: atm_tc_enqueue in net/sched/sch_atm.c in the Linux kernel through 6.1.4allows attackers to cause a denial of service because of type confusion(non-negative numbers can sometimes indicate a TC_ACT_SHOT condition ratherthan valid classification results).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
